trans-unit.source: Iterates over all ancestor nodes according to the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath"></xref> ancestor axis rules, and returns the nodes in document order without duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 逐一查看所有上階節點，根據<xref href="System.Xml.XPath"></xref>祖系座標軸規則，並不重複的文件中的節點順序的傳回。

trans-unit.source: The node from which you start traversing ancestors.
Enables you to filter nodes based on the name.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if you want the `context` node to be returned as a part of the iteration, instead of being filtered out.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果您想`context`一部分的反覆項目，而不會被篩選掉時要傳回的節點。

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: 導覽器 的變更只有當狀態<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法已傳回`true`。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Positions the iterator on the next ancestor node in document order.
trans-unit.target: 將 iterator 置於文件順序中的下一個上階節點。

trans-unit.source: If the iterator was set to the next ancestor node in document order, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: MoveNext 方法如果迭代器已設定為文件順序中的下一個上階節點，設定<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A>屬性目前的結果巡覽器; 否則<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A>屬性維持不變。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.AncestorDocOrderIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the iterator was set to the next ancestor node in document order; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果迭代器設定成在文件順序中的下一個上階節點否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
